description: Alteration of roof from hip to gable end; rear roof extension incorporating 2 Juliet balconies and installation of three roof lights to front roofslope (Lawful Development Certificate for a Proposed Development)
decision_conditions: The proposed development shown in drawings numbers:

21-012-P01 (Site Location plan); 21-012-P02 (Site Location plan); ; 21-012-P03 (Proposed First Floor plan); 21-012-P04 (Proposed Loft plan); 21-012-P05 (Proposed Roof plan); 21-012-P06 (Proposed Elevations); 21-012-P07 (Proposed Elevations); 21-012-P08 (Proposed Elevations); 21-012-P09 (Proposed Sections); 21-012-E01 (Site Location plan); 21-012-E02 (Site Location plan); ; 21-012-E03 (Proposed First Floor plan); 21-012-E04 (Proposed Loft plan); 21-012-E05 (Proposed Roof plan); 21-012-E06 (Proposed Elevations); 21-012-E07 (Proposed Elevations); 21-012-E08 (Proposed Elevations); 21-012-E09 (Proposed Sections);
falls within the provisions of Schedule 2, Part 1, Classes B and C of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development Order) (England) Order 2015 and is therefore lawful.
